name: DAOHQ
intro: The one-stop-shop to find, invest and vote in DAOs
introduce: DAOHQ is the one-stop-shop to find, invest and vote in extraordinary DAOs. DAOHQ's mission is to facilitate mass adoption of decentralized autonomous organizations (DAOs) where anyone can find, invest in, and join DAOs across niches. Currently the largest DAO directory on the internet, making it easy to search over 1,000 DAOs by category, blockchain, and treasury size.
